title: The Uncertain Ecologist
text:
Hello. My name is Matt and I am an uncertain ecologist. My research focuses on uncertainty in conservation decision making and how best to make use of it in statistical models and in communication with stakeholders. I have a footing in evidence synthesis and a strong sideline in pheasants.



Edwards’s pheasant

title: The Uncertain Ecologist
text:
Interests

Evidence synthesis
Conservation decision making
Biodiversity conservation
Bayesian networks

title: The Uncertain Ecologist
text:
Education

PhD Zoology, 2012, University of Pretoria

title: The Uncertain Ecologist
text:
Biography
I am an “uncertain ecologist”. My research focuses on uncertainty in conservation decision making and how best to make use of it in statistical models and in communication with stakeholders. I have a footing in evidence synthesis and a strong sideline in pheasants.
I am currently employed as a Researcher at theNorwegian Institute for Nature Research, based in the head office in Trondheim. A list of my publications can be found here.

title: The Uncertain Ecologist
text:
Interests

Evidence synthesis
Conservation decision making
Biodiversity conservation
Bayesian networks
Open and Reproducible Science in Ecology

title: The Uncertain Ecologist
text:
Education
PhD Zoology, 2012, University of Pretoria
